name: arNXMVault
description: arNXM Vault. Vault to stake wNXM in Nexus Mutual while maintaining your liquidity.

functionDecorators.name: alertTransfer
functionDecorators.description: When arNXM tokens are transferred, the referrer stakes must be adjusted on RewardManager. This is taken care of by a "_beforeTokenTransfer" function on the arNXM ERC20.

parameterDecorators.name: _from
parameterDecorators.description: The user that tokens are being transferred from.

parameterDecorators.name: _to
parameterDecorators.description: The user that tokens are being transferred to.

parameterDecorators.name: _amount
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of tokens that are being transferred.*.

functionDecorators.name: approveNxmToWNXM
functionDecorators.description: Approve wNXM to transfer NXM from this contract.*.

functionDecorators.name: arNxmValue
functionDecorators.description: Find the arNxm value of a certain amount of wNxm.

parameterDecorators.name: _wAmount
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of wNxm to check arNxm value of.

returnDecorators.name: arAmount
returnDecorators.description: The amount of arNxm the input amount of wNxm is worth.*.

functionDecorators.name: aum
functionDecorators.description: Used to determine total Assets Under Management.

returnDecorators.name: aumTotal
returnDecorators.description: Full amount of assets under management (wNXM balance + stake deposit).*.

functionDecorators.name: changeAdminPercent
functionDecorators.description: Change the percent of rewards that are given for administration of the contract.

parameterDecorators.name: _adminPercent
parameterDecorators.description: The percent of rewards to be given for administration (10 == 1%, 1000 == 100%)*.

functionDecorators.name: changeBeneficiary
functionDecorators.description: Change beneficiary of the administration funds.

parameterDecorators.name: _newBeneficiary
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the new beneficiary to receive funds.*.

functionDecorators.name: changePauseDuration
functionDecorators.description: Owner may change the amount of time that withdrawals are paused after a hack is confirmed.

parameterDecorators.name: _pauseDuration
parameterDecorators.description: The new amount of time that withdrawals will be paused.*.

functionDecorators.name: changeProtocols
functionDecorators.description: Owner may change protocols that we stake for.

parameterDecorators.name: _protocols
parameterDecorators.description: New list of protocols to stake for.*.

functionDecorators.name: changeReferPercent
functionDecorators.description: Owner may change the percent of insurance fees referrers receive.

parameterDecorators.name: _referPercent
parameterDecorators.description: The percent of fees referrers receive. 50 == 5%.*.

functionDecorators.name: changeReserveAmount
functionDecorators.description: Owner may change how much of the AUM should be saved in reserve each period.

parameterDecorators.name: _reserveAmount
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of wNXM (in token Wei) to reserve each period.*.

functionDecorators.name: changeRestakePeriod
functionDecorators.description: Owner may change the amount of time required to be waited between restaking.

parameterDecorators.name: _restakePeriod
parameterDecorators.description: Amount of time required between restakes (starts at 6 days or 86400 * 6).*.

functionDecorators.name: changeRewardDuration
functionDecorators.description: Owner may change the amount of time it takes to distribute rewards from Nexus.

parameterDecorators.name: _rewardDuration
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of time it takes to fully distribute rewards.*.

functionDecorators.name: changeUnstakePercent
functionDecorators.description: Owner can change what percent of stake to unstake each week.

parameterDecorators.name: _unstakePercent
parameterDecorators.description: The new percent of funds to unstake each week.*.

functionDecorators.name: deposit
functionDecorators.description: Deposit wNxm to get arNxm in return.

parameterDecorators.name: _wAmount
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of wNxm to stake.

parameterDecorators.name: _referrer
parameterDecorators.description: The address that referred this user.*.

functionDecorators.name: getRewardNxm
functionDecorators.description: Split off from restake() function to enable reward fetching at any time.*.

functionDecorators.name: getShieldMiningRewards
functionDecorators.description: claim rewards from shield mining.

parameterDecorators.name: _shieldMining
parameterDecorators.description: shield mining contract address.

parameterDecorators.name: _protocol
parameterDecorators.description: Protocol funding the rewards.

parameterDecorators.name: _sponsor
parameterDecorators.description: sponsor address who funded the shield mining.

parameterDecorators.name: _token
parameterDecorators.description: token address that sponsor is distributing*.

parameterDecorators.name: _protocols
parameterDecorators.description: List of the 10 protocols we're using.

parameterDecorators.name: _wNxm
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the wNxm contract.

parameterDecorators.name: _arNxm
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the arNxm contract.

parameterDecorators.name: _nxmMaster
parameterDecorators.description: Address of Nexus' master address (to fetch others).

parameterDecorators.name: _rewardManager
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the ReferralRewards smart contract.*.

returnDecorators.description: true if `msg.sender` is the owner of the contract.

functionDecorators.name: pauseWithdrawals
functionDecorators.description: Anyone may call this function to pause withdrawals for a certain amount of time. We check Nexus contracts for a recent accepted claim, then can pause to avoid further withdrawals.

parameterDecorators.name: _claimId
parameterDecorators.description: The ID of the cover that has been accepted for a confirmed hack.*.

functionDecorators.name: rescueToken
functionDecorators.description: rescue tokens locked in contract.

parameterDecorators.name: token
parameterDecorators.description: address of token to withdraw.

functionDecorators.name: restake
functionDecorators.description: Restake is to be called weekly. It unstakes 7% of what's currently staked, then restakes.

parameterDecorators.name: lastId
parameterDecorators.description: Frontend must submit last ID because it doesn't work direct from Nexus Mutual.*.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

parameterDecorators.name: newOwner
parameterDecorators.description: The address to transfer ownership to.

functionDecorators.name: transferSecondOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

parameterDecorators.name: newOwner
parameterDecorators.description: The address to transfer ownership to.

functionDecorators.name: wNxmValue
functionDecorators.description: Find the wNxm value of a certain amount of arNxm.

parameterDecorators.name: _arAmount
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of arNxm to check wNxm value of.

returnDecorators.name: wAmount
returnDecorators.description: The amount of wNxm the input amount of arNxm is worth.*.

functionDecorators.name: withdraw
functionDecorators.description: Withdraw an amount of wNxm by burning arNxm.

parameterDecorators.name: _arAmount
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of arNxm to burn for the wNxm withdraw.*.
